query: 如图,在△ABC中,E,F,D分别是边AB、AC、BC上的点,且满足\frac{AE}{EB}=\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{1}{3},则四边形AEDF占△ABC面积的()选项：['\\frac{1}{2}', '\\frac{1}{3}', '\\frac{1}{4}', '\\frac{2}{5}']
answer: 解:连接EF,∵\frac{AE}{EB}=\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{1}{3},∴EF∥BC,∴△AEF∽△ABC,∴S~△AEF~:S~△ABC~=1:16,∵△AEF和△DEF有同底EF,∴S~△AEF~:~S△DEF~=1:3,∴四边形AEDF占△ABC面积的\frac{1}{4}．故选:C．
